__e: If you spent half your time minding your daughter's business instead of sticking your nose in everybody else's, she'd still be alive!
You can't tear around this place with no regard for who you are, interfering with those people.
Haven't butted into anybody's business since I was 18 year old, at which time it almost got me killed.
But now looking back on all the lives and stories of others, I know it will be alright.
If you come across this man and fear for your life or the lives of those nearby, you are authorized to use deadly force on sight.
Yeah, well, that's one way to go. And if you had somebody rubbing up your little ashy leg, maybe you would stop getting into everybody else's business because you'd have some of your own.
